mapper.select: SELECT t1.province, t1.proNumber FROM (SELECT t.province, COUNT(*) AS proNumber FROM device_info t WHERE t.ENABLE = 1 and t.province is not null GROUP BY t.province)t1 ORDER BY t1.proNumber desc,t1.province ASC
SELECT t1.city, t1.cyNumber FROM (SELECT t.city, COUNT(*) AS cyNumber FROM device_info t WHERE t.ENABLE = 1 and t.province = #{province} GROUP BY t.city)t1 ORDER BY t1.cyNumber desc,t1.city ASC
SELECT t.status, COUNT(*) AS statusNumber FROM device_info t WHERE t.ENABLE = 1 GROUP BY t.status
SELECT t.status, COUNT(*) AS statusNumber FROM device_info t WHERE t.ENABLE = 1 and t.city is not null and t.province = #{province} GROUP BY t.status
